verses.roman:
hanyamāna-balānīkā
vṛṣṇibhir jaya-kāṅkṣibhiḥ
rājāno vimukhā jagmur
jarāsandha-puraḥ-sarāḥ

synonyms: hanyamāna—being killed; bala-anīkāḥ—whose armies; vṛṣṇibhiḥ—by the Vṛṣṇis; jaya—for victory; kāṅkṣibhiḥ—who were eager; rājānaḥ—the kings; vimukhāḥ—discouraged; jagmuḥ—left; jarāsandha-puraḥ-sarāḥ—headed by Jarāsandha.
translation: Seeing their armies being struck down by the Vṛṣṇis, who were eager for victory, the kings headed by Jarāsandha were discouraged and left the battlefield.
